title: Is anyone else having issues with Pixel 5 disconnecting from music apps
content: I BOUGHT MY PIXEL 5 3 AND 1/2 WEEKS AGO EVERYTHING WAS WORKING FINE FOR THE LAST 2 DAYS EVERY TIME I CONNECT TO PANDORA OR YOUTUBE IT WILL DISCONNECT AFTER A FEW SECONDS TURN IT BACK ON IT DISCONNECTS AFTER A FEW SECONDS ANYBODY ELSE HAVING THIS PROBLEM WHAT ARE WE SUPPOSED TO DO
